lyrics:
He put it on me, I put it on,
Like there was nothing wrong.
It didn't fit,
It wasn't right.
Wasn't just the size.
They say you know,
When you know.
I don't know.

I didn't feel the fairytale feeling, no.

If it's not like the movies,

When he's the one,
I'll come undone,

Snowwhite said when I was young,
